content.raw:
I just tested it, run fine in my precise + groovy system. Steps (not fully tested while written so they could need fixes):

```
apt-get update
apt-get install gazebo-nightly
mkdir -p ws/src
cd ws/src
hg clone #!/osrf/osrf-common
hg clone #!/osrf/sandia-hand
hg clone #!/osrf/drcsim
git clone https://github.com/ros-simulation/gazebo_ros_pkgs
cd ..
catkin_make -j5 install
. install/setup.bash
. install/share/drcsim/setup.sh 
```

I just tested it, run fine in my precise + groovy system. Steps (not fully tested while written so they could need fixes):

apt-get update
apt-get install gazebo-nightly
mkdir -p ws/src
cd ws/src
hg clone #!/osrf/osrf-common
hg clone #!/osrf/sandia-hand
hg clone #!/osrf/drcsim
git clone https://github.com/ros-simulation/gazebo_ros_pkgs
cd ..
catkin_make -j5 install
. install/setup.bash
. install/share/drcsim/setup.sh
